title: Crime Alert 10.05.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.05.18
description:
Teacher arrested for snorting drug, passing out in class. Paul Manafort meets with special councils team this week. Teen uses dating app to rob men.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
